resources.string: To access all the settings, everything happens on your watch: on the watch face, long press on the time. After 1s, you\'ll see a button appear at the bottom, tap on it to customize.

Welcome into Pixel Minimal Watch Face companion app

This companion phone app will help you install the watch face on your watch and become premium to unlock widgets and weather.\n\nIf you have any issue, please contact me using the app menu for support.
